scripts.build: rm -rf .parcel-cache docs && parcel src/index.html src/callback.html --dist-dir docs -public-url ./
scripts.release: mkdir -p chrome_extension && rm -rf chrome_extension/* && cp content.js manifest.json ./chrome_extension/ && cp -r icons ./chrome_extension/
scripts.serve: rm -rf .parcel-cache docs && parcel src/index.html src/callback.html --dist-dir docs
